cast.name: 普雷德拉格·莫姆奇洛维奇 Predrag Momčilović

introduction: Summary of the film Relying on the work of Letonian scientist, Constantine Raudive, Marko Mazibrada, psychiatrist disappointed in his profession, performing experiments aimed to empirically determine whether there is life after death, by phenomenon of apophenia  has been  brought to Simon Besedić, skeptics, alcoholic and editor in chief of Monthly Armageddon, the magazine that deals with the paranormal phenomena. Together with  Nikola Mrzopoljic, dredger and paterfamilias to whom Besedić owes its life  and Eta, pharmacist and prostitute which Besedić offers a permanent connection, they enter the sequence of events that culminate in an evp seanse reaching the extreme limits of human perception.
